issues.description: The problem statement specifies a constructor SealSaloon(String) taking a saloon name, but the solution implementation only provides a no-argument constructor. Students following the spec will implement the wrong signature and fail expected tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the SealSaloon constructor in the solution (and teach students to implement) to accept a String parameter, e.g.: public SealSaloon(String name) { this.orders = new Meal[]{}; }
